query:
SELECT 
                u1.email AS from_email, 
                u2.email AS to_email, 
                uc.is_accepted
            FROM user_connection uc
            JOIN users u1 ON uc.from_id = u1.id
            JOIN users u2 ON uc.to_id = u2.id
            WHERE uc.from_id = $1 AND uc.is_accepted = true
